transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, very good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon. Hello?
Executive: Ji Ritik baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji aapke jo partner hai na sir hello aapko meri voice aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ha aa rahi hai boliye.
Executive: Mai keh raha hu aapke jo partner hai na sir Rahul ji jo aapka dekhte hai Mother Sweet ka dekhte hai.
Executive: Unhone actually ek concern
Customer: Accha Rahul ji bol rahe hai aap?
Executive: Actually sir aapne concern raise kiya tha ki aapko relevant leads nahi aa rahi hai, hai na?
Customer: Kaha se bol rahe hai aap?
Executive: Ritik baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha Ritik ji ha boliye. Ha maine concern raise kiya tha. Aap uska number dekhiye na sir jo sambhalte hai online sara mai sambhalta nahi bataiye aapko.
Executive: Ji ji meri unse sir actually abhi wo mera ha actually sir wo mera abhi call pick nahi kar rahe hai isliye mai aapse connect kar raha hu. Dekhiye
Customer: Nahi wo call pick wohi baat karte hai sir online.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Wohi sambhalte hai na online sara hamara.
Executive: Accha online wohi sara sambhalte hai. Toh sir meri aapse request hogi unka jo number hai na woh aap hai na apne usme profile me add kara lijiye sir. Kyuki dekhiye hum unko offline call baar baar nahi kar sakte kyuki IndiaMART ki guidelines ke accordingly hume
Executive: uh on jo aapke jaise maine abhi connect kiya hai. Waise hi hume unko connect karna padega. Toh isliye mai aapse request hai aap unka number agar add kara
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: Karwata hu mai na unko bolke.
Executive: Uh abhi baat kara sakte hai sir conference pe le lijiye unko agar aisa hai toh.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
(silence)
Automated Voice: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold
Customer: 3 baje ke baad hi karenge woh baat. Hello.
Executive: 3 baje ke pehle baat nahi ho payegi sir?
Customer: 3 baje ke pehle nahi ho payegi woh meeting hai.
Executive: Accha accha dekhiye aapne jo concern dala hai mai aapko uska solution aapko mai bata de raha hu. Aap unse chahe toh discuss kar lena ek baar. Thik hai? Usme dekhiye solution ho sakta hai ki humne jitne bhi aapke products hai unke specification me loose add karna padega. Packaging type jo hota hai na loose woh add karna padega.
Customer: Bhaiya jo loose ki inquiry aati hai na hello.
Executive: Haan ji boliye boliye. Hello.
Customer: Jo inquiry loose ki aati hai na unko bhi hum log call karte hai woh bhi bolte hai packaging ka maal chahiye.
Customer: Loose ki inquiry packaging maal maang rahe hai woh log toh phir inquiry ka matlab hi kya hai? Saare unko packaging ka hi jab unko inquiry ki aapne loose ka dala hua hai uske andar sara.
Executive: Mai samajh raha hu. Teen chaar mahine ho gaye hum log roz complaint likhte hai aapko. Koi uska result aata nahi hai. Dekhiye nahi nahi sir mai wohi aapko bata raha hu.
Executive: Mai wohi aapko batana chah raha hu sir dekhiye customer care pe concern daalne se kuch nahi hoga. Kyuki call hamare paas bhi aati hai hame hi aapka attend karna padega isliye mai aapse woh keh raha tha. Aapko aisa koi concern hua kare toh aap directly mujhe call kijiye. Mera number save kar lijiye. Aap customer care pe call mat kijiye usse koi matlab response aisa nahi milega kyuki response hum hi karte hai. Thik hai? Aur usme dekhiye mai aapko batana chahta hu agar loose ki aapko nahi mil pa rahi hai toh usme do solution hum kar sakte hai. Pehla hame jitne bhi products hai unke specification me loose add karna padega packaging type me. Usme maan lijiye nahi hai. Aur dusra aapke jo product name me hai usme hame aage loose add karna padega. Jaise maan lijiye aapka ek product hai nylon sev namkeen. Isme hum aage add kar dete hai loose nylon sev namkeen. Thik hai? Jaise mai ek me kar deta hu.
Executive: Yeh loose maine add kiya hai isme. Thik hai? Toh usse kya hoga buyer koi bhi aayega inquiry aur call woh aapka profile dekh ke hi karega. Hai na aapka catalog dekh ke hi karega. Catalog me usko dekhega ki product name ke aage loose laga hua hai. Toh woh samajh jayega ki yeh loose items me hi deal karta hai. Toh agar usse loose ki requirement hogi toh woh aapko directly bol dega ki haa hame loose ki requirement hai. Toh aapke paas jo irrelevant aa rahi hai na jo packet packaging wali aa rahi hai woh aapke paas inquiry se calls nahi aayenge. Aapke paas loose items ke hi aayenge. Thik hai?
Executive: Yeh kaam hame yeh karna hai ki hame jo specification hai usme packaging type me loose daalna hai sabhi me. Aur jo aapke product names hai usme sabhi ke aage hame loose name add karna padega. Thik hai? Ab maine do me kar diya hai sir. Yeh
Executive: Haan. Jaise yeh sorted banana wafers hai isme mai aage loose add kar deta hu. Thik hai? Yeh maine loose add kar diya isme.
Executive: Haan toh maine do me kar diya sir aise hi aapke baki products me aap uh karwa lijiye unse. Thik hai? Agar uske baad bhi aapko aisa koi issue aata hai toh aap mere number pe call kijiye aap customer care pe call mat kijiye. Thik hai? Usse kyuki concern aapka hum hi attend karenge.
Executive: Thik hai sir? Hello aapko meri voice aa rahi hai?
Customer: Thik hai bhaiya okay. Ha baki sab
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Receiving inquiries for packaging material instead of loose.



Resolution:

- Explained adding 'loose' to product specifications.

- Added 'loose' to two product names as example.

- Advised to add 'loose' to all product names.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to add 'loose' to remaining products.

- Executive asked customer to call him directly.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, loose, packaging, product names, specifications
